Sentencas: The U-type parallel channels for large size planar solid oxide fuel cell (pSOFC) are systematically optimized with the computational fluid dynamics (CFD) method.
Titulo: Flow uniformity optimization for large size planar solid oxide fuel cells with U-type parallel channel designs

Sentencas: The CFD calculations are based on realistic 3D gas channel models and typical pSOFC working parameters.
Titulo: Flow uniformity optimization for large size planar solid oxide fuel cells with U-type parallel channel designs

Sentencas: The optimized geometric parameters include the height of interconnect ribs, aspect ratios of the inlet-header and outlet-header cross-sections, the sum of inlet- and outlet-header widths and the ratio of the outlet-header width to the inlet-header width (a).
Titulo: Flow uniformity optimization for large size planar solid oxide fuel cells with U-type parallel channel designs

Sentencas: Detailed CFD calculations show that a Suitable at and a relatively large header width are necessary for the flow uniformity of both air and fuel in large size pSOFCs.
Titulo: Flow uniformity optimization for large size planar solid oxide fuel cells with U-type parallel channel designs

Sentencas: In particular, alpha is demonstrated to be a key parameter for the flow uniformity of large size pSOFCs with U-type parallel channel designs and a proper choice of at is of critical engineering importance.
Titulo: Flow uniformity optimization for large size planar solid oxide fuel cells with U-type parallel channel designs

Sentencas: The physical origin for the importance of alpha on the flow distribution is analyzed.
Titulo: Flow uniformity optimization for large size planar solid oxide fuel cells with U-type parallel channel designs

Titulo: Flow uniformity optimization for large size planar solid oxide fuel cells with U-type parallel channel designs
